ygData.subject: Re: Grid Refinement Criteria
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello, Either additional point (x(j+2)+x(j+1))/2 will be added if the ratio (x (j+2) -x(j+1))/(x(j)-x(j+1) larger than the specified ratio or additional point

Hello,
Either additional point (x(j+2)+x(j+1))/2 will be added if the ratio=
 (x
(j+2) -x(j+1))/(x(j)-x(j+1) larger than the specified ratio or 
additio=
nal point (x(j+1)+x(j))/2 will be added if the ratio (x(j+1) -x
(j))/(x(j+1=
)-x(j++2) larger than the specified ratio. 
Best regards, Anatoli
